Text:
All episodes from this season:

http://thepiratebay.org/tv/566/S04/

This is a great torrent and everything, but a terrible episode.  80% of it is a recap from a previous episode a year or two ago.

Even if you're a loyal fan of the show, this is def not a must-watch.

Yep definately the worst episode so far, I had to check the filenames to make sure I wasn't watching the episode from a year or two ago.
Next weeks looks to be aother regurgitated affair as well, back to Mams soul shack!
Do you know were I can find the other season's?
